TopicTitle: Spawn Kerbals in External Command Seat?

Articles.Content:
I am building a cargo plane with a rover inside, and I want to use the EAS-1 External Command Seat because it, well, looks cool. As far as I can tell, the only way for me to get kerbals into the seats is to exit the cockpit of the plane and walk all the way around to the back of the plane and manually board the rover. Is it possible to make Kerbals spawn in the seat instead? 

                                                                        Thanks in advance,

                                                                               -Jagger

Have a look at this mod.

Although, external seat is "external" for a reason.  So,.. you can also design a bus full of kerbals and then board the rocket by climbing up the ladder.

There are also some compact-er versions of crew cabins, you might like the USI Exploration Pack instead!
